description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Long ago, the 5 great nations lived in peace, then the Region of Flames attacked.  Our hero, Landon traveled the Earth Nation protecting it and fending off flame intruders. Now are Landon must travel to the thunder region and do the same.
description.short: Long ago, the 5 great nations lived in peace, then the Region of Flames attacked.  Our hero, Landon traveled the Earth Nation protecting it and fending off flame intruders. Now are Landon must travel to the thunder region and do the same.
